# NSGradient.DrawingOptions

**Structure**

Constants that specify gradient drawing options.

## Declaration

```swift
struct DrawingOptions
```

## Overview

These constants are used by the primitive drawing methods to determine if drawing occurs outside of the gradient start and end locations.

## Constants

- **drawsBeforeStartingLocation**: Drawing extends before the gradient starting point.
- **drawsAfterEndingLocation**: Drawing extends beyond the gradient end point.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**: Creates a new instance with the specified raw value.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- ExpressibleByArrayLiteral
- OptionSet
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
- SetAlgebra
